properties.name: Owlery
properties.desc: Pick up all your letters, parcels, and howlers here, home of Baranof Island's best-trained owls. Mon - Sat 9 am - 3 pm.

properties.name: Ollivander's Wand Shop
properties.desc: Take a walk through Ollivander's shop and let the wand choose you.

properties.name: The Daily Prophet
properties.desc: Run by one of the oldest Wizarding families on Baranof Island and with strong ties to the Ministry of Magic.

properties.name: Flourish & Blotts
properties.desc: The best place for Hogwarts students to purchase their schoolbooks, ask for Irma Pince Saturdays 1-6 pm. Beware the monster book of monsters! Purchasing books via owl delivery also available.

properties.name: Madam Malkin's Robes For All Occasions
properties.desc: Fine selection of wizard and witch dress robes, traveling cloaks, and, if you can find it, an invisibility cloak. Also a selection of muggle clothes for special occasions. Regular hours Mon 6 - 8 pm Thurs Noon to 3 pm Sat Noon to 3 pm.

properties.name: Ministry of Magic
properties.desc: Run by Marcus Gourmet Fudge, but don't let the muggle offices fool you, there is a vast floo network in the bathrooms on the 3rd floor.

properties.name: Wizarding Wireless Network
properties.desc: Featuring music programs like "The Witching Hour" and news bulletins for the wizarding world, the Cable House has been charmed to appear as a coffee shop.

properties.name: Forbidden Forest
properties.desc: An ancient forest that holds many secrets and creatures, some dark and dangerous, others friendly. Off-limits to students except in the case of detention or Care of Magical Creatures lessons.

properties.name: Quidditch Pitch
properties.desc: If interested in Quidditch tryouts, find 7th year Quidditch Hufflepuff Captain Davidagog Kreissbridge-Tompkmycus and ask him when Quidditch practice is.

properties.name: Madam Primpernelle's Beautifying Potions
properties.desc: This store specializes in helping witches get rid of warts and worse.

properties.name: Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlour
properties.desc: Try our newest flavor: Butterbeer!

properties.name: Quality Quidditch Supplies
properties.desc: Upset your 'Reparo' charm isn't working? Come in today and get 25% off a broomstick repair kit.

properties.name: The Leaky Cauldron
properties.desc: A popular wizarding pub and inn. The gateway between the non-wizarding world and Diagon Alley.

properties.name: Potage's Cauldron Shop
properties.desc: Sells all sizes of all types of cauldrons: copper, brass, pewter, silver, self-stirring, and collapsable.

properties.name: Auror Training Academy
properties.desc: A 3-year stringent program for only the best and brightest wizards and witches. Currently accepting volunteers over the age of 17 to endure the imperius curse and subsequently perform a variety of field tests.

properties.name: Twilfitt and Tatting's
properties.desc: A wizarding clothing shop preferred by upperclass Slytherins.

properties.name: Great Lake
properties.desc: Don't swim in it! Ellenissa Chenophadoran once got attacked by merpeople!

properties.name: Scribbulus Writing Instruments
properties.desc: Sells quills, color-changing ink, and parchment.

properties.name: Rosa Lee Teabag
properties.desc: Hope you don't see the Grim at the bottom of your cup in this tea shop!

properties.name: Obscurus Books
properties.desc: Wizarding book publisher with a range of titles including Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them. Also tickets sold here to all wizarding events, such as the Quidditch Cup. Tickets for Platform 9 3/4 are sold here for 1 Galleon. Current 9 3/4 ticket purchasing hours are Saturdays 10-5.

properties.name: Magical Menagerie
properties.desc: Come get whatever pet you need! We sell poisonous orange snails, a giant jewel-encrusted tortoise, sleek black rats that are very intelligent, owls, ravens, cats of every color.

properties.name: Junk Shop
properties.desc: A shop that sells items such as broken wands, lopsided scales, etc.

properties.name: Secondhand Robe Shop
properties.desc: Vintage clothes are all the rage these days. Come in and buy some robes that are hip and cheap.

properties.name: Sugarplum's Sweet Shop
properties.desc: This shop sells magical sweets like Cauldron Cakes, Liquorice Wands, and Pumpkin Pasties.

properties.name: Slug & Jiggers Apothecary
properties.desc: Established in 1207, we are the oldest apothecary this side of the Great Dragon's Maw. We have every potion to suit your needs, from Essence of Dittany to Wiggenwald Potion.

properties.name: I Hogwarts!
properties.desc: You love Hogwarts?? So do we! Come in and get Hogwarts paraphenilia of all kinds!

properties.name: Broomstix
properties.desc: Disguised as a muggle convenience store, the broom selection is larger than it appears to be.

properties.name: Borgin and Burkes
properties.desc: Dealers of unusual and ancient wizarding artifacts and antiques. Come get your human bones, glass eyes, spiked instruments, cursed necklaces, and packs of bloody cards.

properties.name: The White Wyvern
properties.desc: A pub not for the weak-hearted, currently on tap: Bludd's Blood Ale.

properties.name: Markus Scarrs Indelible Tattoos
properties.desc: A wizarding tattoo parlour. Get your house mascot emblazoned on your arm for life.

properties.name: Gringott's Wizarding Bank
properties.desc: Operated by goblins. Go here to exchange muggle money for galleons. You must ask to access your vault otherwise they'll think you're a muggle. Wizard-banking hours are Wednesday through Friday 2:00-5:30 pm.

properties.name: Beard Trimming
properties.desc: Podric Batworthy The XXIII's Beard Trimming at low cost.
